metadata.Title: CVE-2018-1000040 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - low
metadata.Description: In MuPDF 1.12.0 and earlier, multiple use of uninitialized value bugs inthe PDF parser could allow an attacker to cause a denial of service (crash)or influence program flow via a crafted file.

criterions.comment: mupdf: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
